title: Kan Pathian kulhpui nghet a ni
lyrics:
Kan Pathian kulhpui nghet a ni,
Himna hmunpui, chhe thei lo;
Sualna tuilian fawn vel mah se, 
A nghing lovang kanhimna.
Setana ral lian chuan, 
Fing tak leh thiam takin,
Vervekna ralthuan nen, Min tihchhiat a tum reng;
Leian hneh thei an awm lo.
Kan chakna ringin tang ila, 
Kan theihtawp pawh a thlawn ang;
Mahse, kan zam lo - Tanpuitu, 
Pathian miruat kan neih hi.
Tu nge ni, in zawt maw? 
Krista Isua ngei kha;
Sipaihote Lalpa, Kumkhuaa pangngai kha, 
Aman dovin a hneh dawn.
He lei hi ramhuai lo khatin, 
Keini min tihchhiat tum se,
Kan hlau lo vang, min hnehtir dawn, 
Pathian ngei chuan - A thuin.
Thim lal, rapthlak ber chu, 
Kan hlau lo'ng engtin pawh;
Thinurin thawk mah se, 
A boral thuai dawn e;
Pathian thuin a that ang.
Pathian thutak an hneh chuang lo'ng 
Lei michakte pungkhawmin;
Thlarau Thianghlim leh thilpekte 
Lalpan min pe, min pui si.
Lei ro leh chhungkuate, 
Kan nun nen la rawh se;
Taksa an tihlum thei, 
Thutak an hneh chuang lo'ng 
Pathian ram a ding reng dawn.
